findings.title: Missing rewardDebt update allows infinite reward claims
findings.description: The claimVulnerable() function mints rewards but doesn't update rewardDebt. Users can call repeatedly to claim the same rewards infinitely.
findings.impact: Unlimited minting of COVER tokens, destroying token value.
findings.recommendation: Update rewardDebt before minting: rewardDebt[msg.sender] = deposited[msg.sender] * accRewardPerShare / PRECISION
